abstract: report : cecile richards plans to step down as planned parenthood president .
article: planned parenthood president and ceo cecile richards is planning to step down from her role at the organization , buzzfeed reported wednesday . what did the report say ? according to `` two sources familiar with the matter , '' buzzfeed reported richards , 60 , has informed some members of planned parenthood 's board of directors of her decision . richards has been president of planned parenthood since 2006 . in a statement provided to buzzfeed , a planned parenthood spokesperson said , richards `` plans to discuss 2018 and the next steps for planned parenthood 's future at the upcoming board meeting . ''

buzzfeed reported the meeting will take place late next week . a spokesperson for planned parenthood did not immediately return theblaze 's request for comment . buzzfeed noted that during richards ' time at planned parenthood , she has driven `` celebrity-oriented campaigns '' and increased its political activism . richards ' memoir , titled , `` make trouble , '' is scheduled for publication in april . pro-life activists celebrated the news on twitter . : / / twitter . com/cateici/status / 956235697438052352 .
